title: Remote Monitoring Pollution Simulator
description: A project made in unity. A pollution simulator which showcases the rise and fall of pollution level in a city which is affected by emissions from factories and cars. Trees help to reduce pollution level by 5% and houses determine the population count.

title: Rescue Point
description: Developed a web-based platform using the MERN stack to enable hospitals to share critical resources efficiently, improving patient care and operational speed. Implemented secure real-time data processing and user authentication, ensuring reliable and safe exchanges of medical resources.

title: CodeJett
description: Co-developed an online collaborative coding platform with real-time synchronization, allowing developers to edit projects simultaneously from various locations. Designed a responsive user interface using React.js and managed backend APIs with Node.js, enhancing user engagement and platform reliability.

title: Twitter Database Server
description: Created a MySQL and Python-based server to automatically detect and remove duplicate tweets and filter out profanity as a measure against cyberbullying.Engineered a duplicate detection algorithm to enhance data integrity and efficiency in real-time content management on social platforms.

title: GUI Based Personal Calender
description: A simple GUI based Calendar that has a multiple profile feature with a password lock for each profile. You can create a reminder schedule in this calendar along with a set time. Enabling users to effortlessly schedule, manage, and track events.
